## Rules
1. Be nice to one another 2. Do not throw the game 3. Do not post at night 4. Do not Angleshoot 5. If you're not active for 24 hours, I will send out a prod, if there is no response within twelve hours of the prod, then you will be force-replaced. 6. 20 posts per phase required 7. **Do not discuss this game anywhere outside of host-sanctioned threads, under any means. If you are caught doing so before the game has begun, you will be barred from joining as a player or backup.** 8. Please do not use ciphers or codes to prove that you were not jumped. That is stricltly forbidden. **You WILL be modkilled if caught doing this.** Please use your posting alone to indicate you are still yourself, not pointing back to a time day 1 where you spelled out the word B E A N S with the first letter of your sentences or something. 9. This might seem obvious, but Please Please Please Please Please Please don't post anywhere else on your alt account. Triple check, change it to a different theme, anything, but in a game based on alt identity we really can't afford issues with it. 10. Don't out your own identity. Don't hint at your identity. Statements such as "I'm petting my cat", "I have to go to school", or "I'm going to sleep" *are* hints at your identity. This rule will be punished strictly. Don't mention anything outside of the context of the game, it spoils the game integrity.
#### Follow the [Global Forum/Discord/Game/Meta Rules - Please Read First ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244), and the [Official Forum Mafia and Forum of Lies Rules ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926). Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up.
## Gameplay - There are two types of roles in this game, Vanilla Town and Mafia Things. - The Mafia Things will have a discord server where they may discuss things and submit actions. - Mafia Things, at night, have the option of killing a town player, or killing one of their own Mafia players, who will instead receive and be able to post on the account of a chosen Town player. - Night kills will be flipless. Executions will provide flips. - Players may not out their identity under any means, but are allowed to post in any way they want that follows to rule to make their tone difficult to emulate. - Days will last for 48 hours while Nights last for 24 hours - Executions in this game are done by plurality and majority. - Upon tied votes, a random player (including no-execute) tied for the most votes will be executed. - Votes are locked in lylo **There are no journals or death notes, so don't ask for one**

eevee game review report:

Summary

1. Setup type:

1.1. Open - All possible roles are revealed at the start of the game.
The exact amount of each role is revealed to players.
The exact distribution is unknown to the players.
Roles that are not on the list cannot appear in the game.

2. Bastard:

2.1. Non-Bastard - OP will not lie to you.
Role PM will not lie to you.
Mod announcements and flips will not lie to you.
Night results might be false only if a different role or mechanic affects them in a specified way.

2.1.3 Non-Bastard Other - There is another significant REVEALED game-changing mechanic present.

3. Votes:

3.3. Majority + Plurarity - Person with the highest amount of votes on the day end is eliminated.
If a majority is reached earlier during any part of the day, elimination happens upon reaching majority instead.

3.3.1. Random on tied votes.

4. Votes for no elimination:

4.3. Allowed

5. Mafia factional kill:

5.3. Optional

6. Mafia factional chat:

6.1. Exists, works both during day and night

7. Anti-Claim mechanics:

7.2. Don’t exist

8. ITAs:

8.2. Don’t exist

9. Last will / Logs:

9.2. Don’t exist

10. Alts:

10.3. Alts will be REQUIRED to play this game and provided to you after the game starts.
Alt speculation is forbidden.

11. Reviewer notes:

Well known setup.
Mafia gets ability to “possessor” jump in exchange for more town players existing.

Please - Do not cheat it via creating weird codes or trying to suggest own identity to others, as ability to jump was already taken into account by adding more townies to the setup.
Aka. Play the game as it was meant to be plaied.

Tips for Alting

1. Play this game on a different browser than your main one, or use a browser extension such as Firefox Multi-Account Containers

2. Mute the game thread on your main account, and mute other threads on your alt account. This makes it less likely that you will post in the wrong game on the wrong account.

3. Change your site theme while using an alternate account. If you use dark mode on your main, use light mode on your alt.
